steps.title: Gasless Transactions
steps.description: Try out all Abstract apps without worrying about getting tokens. We have you covered.

steps.title: Interchain Portal
steps.description: Abstract works across the Interchain. That means you can move your funds and access apps freely without worrying about bridging.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subTitle: Aenean vulputate eleifend tellus. Aenean leo ligula, porttitor eu, consequat vitae.

questions.ans: Abstract does not have a token.
Abstract is chain-agnostic, and can be deployed anywhere supporting CosmWasm. Non CW chains are supported via ICA.

questions.que: How do I pay for gas?
questions.ans: Gas is paid for by fees on chains Abstract is deployed on. As a user, your experience will be gasless.
Abstract is your interchain wallet, though there are still sign-in options available for existing wallets.
Yes! Any app available on the interconnected IBC ecosystem will be available to access via your Abstract Account.

questions.que: Can I build my own Abstract App?
questions.ans: Yes, yes, and yes! Get started by checking out the developers section and follow the guided tutorials.
